item.title: leetcode数组题目
item.description: Remove Element Given an array and a value, remove all instances of that value in place and return the new length. The order of elements can be changed. It doesn’t matter what you leave beyond the new length. 主要思路如下图： code: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 int removeElement(int* nums, int numsSize, int val) { int i,j; i=-1; for(j=0;j<numsSize;j++) if(j-i>0) if(nums[j]!=val)
